channel.title: 世界 - 最新 - Google新闻

item.title: 特朗普说的冲突很容易结束 - 路透社，以色列和伊朗互相罢工
item.description: 实时更新：伊朗和以色列交易罢工，因为冲突狂暴＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 保护以色列人的拦截室和安全室，但是随着伊朗的目标，伤亡和破坏会增长href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxtfblexd1uzfgae90zenuzndyogxynk zpqxdlvwnhu3vkzudvumx0ru1qdufauglux1lyqwp3bmxhzfpva19fwuixr3hdbhy0m3jfofczb1jvuq？oc = 5“ target =“ _空白”>伊朗导弹在以色列罢工后导致多次伤亡＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 以色列中的伊朗导弹罢工至少杀害10；国防部长警告说，“德黑兰将燃烧” ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; fox news

item.title: 乌克兰战争简报：普京在电话中告诉特朗普莫斯科准备恢复和平谈判 - 监护人
item.description: 乌克兰战争简报：普京告诉特朗普在电话中告诉莫斯科恢复和平谈判＆nbsp; 守护者 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxOcnJ5QXdmOFFyMml4UWh5Q2s4RVBWM0VLSUpQVXFlZjdSVXBsRzZ0NmRtX0ZSenFmckMwQzNDcGZzNUJmdzY0T uy0dwdpx1v0ajrzq0vrd3lfx2nkqwlyywjcdhptujnmcwd4ukdxn2nwynl2u2u2u2u2u2 hnbgnyvvu3s EPVQJK5EXDNTKNUNF9TMHDODVAXSFL1OGDBQULRSXP3ZE9BCMN0QU5LEJDJDJZVZFU0E？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京对特朗普说话，谴责以色列对伊朗的罢工，克里姆林宫说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi1wfbvv95cuxolxbpvtvqtjtjlrrrrrrw5yow9tv wnuaxjomwnvrujzvgvjltbatwzhd3g3mw9xq1c0btfozvk0bnhlbvderkpxngtmsfetzef1m0t2n193z vvntfktry1tcdcythjjywfbdglusjk5yxziagrhdgftannqmluyv1r3yy1vczhpou40y2ey2eyenvqdmzno XK5ZKVXZU9ATGPTR2FOX2RKDM0TYVBCOXHWVGLGVTZNT0DBRWRYWJLHHVWTVQTDXBXV0CU9KVMVMVIV09FW xhlvgn1mkjywjvfb9ib3afbvv95cuxqnvdwt09jzu5zce14x1rvt25iumi2bs1qdhddhddavj6bkzcvvjrt 3LVCJU0U09MQKY3UULYZGPCVGRYU0NJWKZKX290LVLHBZFZQW5FVZJQCE55ALFIU2TJN2N2N2N4UHCWMDU3U WHQX1VKS0VVDZQ0CWNJC3BZTKOYMW1QCDHPMZBKNTHWZM5MZDLXY1HWBTRUCZI0ZDFFFFWLZIYZLCAHVIS FBHAVVPVKC5WUS0EGLISDR1BDRPODZFNVJOM2HRBKTCRTN1RU1QEMHUSWV1BC1BC13TXDXD1N1VPNMDX？ target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰无人机破坏了被占领的Zaporizhzhia Oblast摧毁俄罗斯防空系统，军事情报说＆nbsp; nbsp; KYIV独立href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmie0fvx3lxte1qedz2zhz2zhz6r2vxmwznsgjuwfy4q3fwc2hrt1hrt1hrt1 hrt1qtag9uzmrpnxq0q0q1 l3agx2adrxekhiwd1strqvs1rcs1imwljmjfumenumnumnumnumnumpvn3vacl8zz1plegf0mer0mezjyuvxwlp0mdvrc0jsnhkwqlv qlv Qlv4nnnnnnnnnnnnpvx2ddwoa？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普：以色列和伊朗之间的战争应结束＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 普京和特朗普讨论了中东紧张局势，乌克兰战争，电话＆nbsp; ABC News

item.title: 特朗普政府认为将36个国家 /地区添加到旅行禁令名单 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普政府认为添加36个国家/地区的旅行列表＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 随着旅行禁令的开始，西澳移民竞赛与家庭团聚href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimwfbvv95cuxpbjdinuy1q1lxafpfa29vewu1qzn5unrynk1snmlyxmlyxmlyxmlyxmlyx0xam3vomxzlbkkvtbbkvtbhexy 0x0tmlotxbzsw1eevpdnee1d0gxqzbwegl4ahlotks1s2ktme9yymowdxm4cmlmlmvvdwegpummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfummfmvjmvjmvjmvjmvjmvjmvjmv jjmv jjmvjmv ppcmkhmkhmkhmb2vwrzhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhtxb3nwrplpx3nwrprpx3nwrwrpx3zzoevbob 0VBdXdNMlpJaTVHZ9IBoAFBVV95cUxOTmVELXY5Nk1jWGtTQlhXWnF0Zng3WV9WMV93b2R2a3NrVEtEa29fakV5MEVXSU9pczFDUTVVa1hmRkhuUVFGWldPU vhganbqrzbjt20xtldkcu9pzng2nko1awvmrvzqum1trvh5mhfntvntvfbckrxqxi1yljhx09yejvuqu5vuqu5vm3lzyxrhuztdruuuutya19fdddddddddd6svvvvmqxe1 vmqxe111 target =“ _空白”>特朗普旅行禁令：AZ倡导者分享难民家庭的担忧＆nbsp; nbsp; fox 10 Phoenix 特朗普的旅行禁令燃料绝望和对密歇根州阿拉伯美国人的政治厌恶href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxpa2zoa2zoa19yr1h3akdic09vtejwy01stmpvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnxfmsvnsfms vnxfms nraelrqwg3cefrlv9ttvjuu25xdu91sgf0tmlowdj6mde4wgxgrm94cm1vevffmhhnonzniclvbrgrgyts3dats1kvlfpbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfrbfyas13bjccc0erputip = oc = occyr = target =“ _ blank”>特朗普正在考虑将另外36个国家/地区添加到他的无旅行名单中，包括非洲和加勒比国家：报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 独立

item.title: 英国同意对儿童性虐待进行新的调查 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 英国的Starmer宣布全国询问'美容帮派' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmirwfbvv95cuxpm1e3svg0rvzrdwgtac1rznrqvzzytusdrgzzzytu1xnrgzzzytu1xndrg1 trg1 rovwwzsjd1dmjpcghmnmszci1qcxfru2dsbzv4nfjimm03x1zyz2kytmnkcvm1akjsa mzavuzrtu5ktwfdu2d3odjqd0dyn3jtwnzkytlhnmz4wes0q1z5udzkzkzwjywnljvhk5 alNUVlkzeEN5ZnVz0gG0AUFVX3lxTE1ZZ1NfZjFHZUVKbWR6UkkyYzhiVk4xTllzNC1jMWo3b3NjYmRuRkhQSjRBbXZYZzRLamJRSGJ2cVo5NnJjSzFHWmItSWc2OTIwRllEN0 tszmlulwjonflqq09oemh6v3dimf9ys21odhazx3u5a292dexsu2tfwmtwri1sseh5vfp6euvjn1luvjn1plurga3dha1plurga3dha1mnwb3bttvc1mnwdktjnftjnftjnft2ppssosksskszndduxzndwwt2psosksaksksaksaksamsksamsksamsksamsksaM target =“ _ blank”>英国，要在马斯克压力＆nbsp; nbsp; ABC News 之后对有组织的儿童性虐待进行调查。

item.title: 等待身体加深印度空气崩溃后家庭的痛苦-BBC
item.description: 等待身体加深印度空气崩溃后家庭的疼痛href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte1fdelumuxwbznpcdbegjpu2vxsgty aurdovcxyvzyuvrur202luvwzvhka2k0bvutbxjnuhdumvdtuwnfu1fktvnknfm3vzdlaupsyznud3z6zw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>印度空气崩溃死亡人数上升到270 ＆nbsp; bbc <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQbS0taXk4YjFkclpUNFFjSk42QVNJaTNZUThiZkpIYks0U0Z2ZFBObmsxdkd4dERfSWRtLS1FVUFRblNDTX fpyjbksjhgy0dwvu9ix3zsawflrgdnoe9vvdhobwkyd002nlqts0hqccvuz1pmuhl0q1c4t mrhcgdqc2pub2dsbfdvnmdwu2rksefnogrvelz6z2vvsggzulrgnldvmtr4t1uzzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>座位11A中的乘客如何成为印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihafbvv95cuxorndsexpry0zvem1uwxnmcfj5sk1ozujwt1l2n2n2n2n2izenhq B3BJEMSYVJC4V0RZV9BWNP6TNMZWGOZOEU0TKF0BI0YOENYX2LJR2ZLS0PAUKOYDE9MRNZCNEZCNEZ2WXPWXPWXPWWWJHGRGR0DSQVY4Z0XPRED4Z0XPREDMX3V lwwvtwmp3egsxuhrfri3sayqbqbqvvffexfmtvzns280mjritdfhotbkktjfimw9znlzjtffna2h0z21rz21rznhznhzznhzzersvurqbqbhjmm3z0ov R3EFDAMY15BTDJMTNFX0LVRG1UEUNENCWEXBT1BTCJHORMTZU2NFD3VQRWWJJVDENEEEHBRYXJATKJATKJATKJ1OGTKJ1OGTFUKXUBK91Q0HVMET2？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>印度在空气崩溃后启动对波音787的检查＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 印度火气坠毁杀死了241人，离开了1个幸存者，航空公司说＆nbsp; nbsp; ap News

item.title: 以色列试图暗杀也门空袭的胡塞军事酋长
item.description: 以色列试图暗杀也门空袭中的胡塞军事酋长 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiyafbvv95cuxnmzc0aus4mxdzkwhzexrjc lzyrxg3zfdgawxzm1ngwvb4bkhktxnyum9rouw5chhdmu5aogrkbdkts1nht3fctzi5d1lbs0m5zdytun Y2EVV0MZVTD0LMZDBMVWRVYTNMCEU0ZMLSRGITDXRWA2STVNBFT25EVEJJBFMWAUDICG1YAHDBSWPZBUZ yvwhntmfpckjnqljlvzk5bkjzlxjtawhzvjnkvfrqm0vqx1jmsnnnoyxzpulrxnlzostj4nn0h6xw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>也门的霍蒂斯目标以色列，其弹道导弹与伊朗协调href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiswfbvv95cuxnwmxjdkrxqxrpbbwtpajzwwurkexjjjwurkexjwurkexjwurkexjwety1vm vm vm vanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvanvan vanhinfmudlndmudlnds1m1om1om1om1om1m19jug9jug9jug9 jug9jug9 jug9 jug9 jug9 jug9 jug9 jug9em1mm WItYlgyZXRSbFVnRXllRlFoaUw0Y1ViOUVDNFp2YS1QcW9OaHRsYU5oQzNGeUhrdktFV3FnUUlzelViNk9LVE4wMlAtcnh5VzZORmo4aHF1RU91dnl4Ujcyck5ILVJ6Q19sZTI0U Wp3VGc4T1k0SmpKc9IBuAFBVV95cUxQcWRiSjdWU1RmNEZmV0tMWlhTMjhTbmMyZFlmTXpWSHkzTERKREs5U202RlBYSGRmREM0UlZpajVOQjR4Mmd4bHU2WmNILVMtMzFKUkpua 1cwdjlVLXBaUlVKbENseGFQMzVvUGVNc0tjZlRRdEctU2JRVEVxdGJLTnlVSGl3LW9iSDdTdkp6TlRhWW5XcGpHNjM0RmlHTHB6bnlMRS0zQU1FTkdGS1ROcTFLY2ZPY0g5?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>五名巴勒斯坦人受伤，包括3个孩子，在胡塞（Houthi）导弹袭击西岸＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmibkfvx3lxte9ilwnezwnla3p33p3tnnlx2ltnunowvjvu2m1mjz0r28tw JNMVNDIM3KYBGG2YXRWOGFZCNI2SZJLC25IAKEZDW1XVDJJQMN5M3LJEXI5QVNAQVNAQKNVMEDJZ2PSN2PSN2VQAW85QXGG5O2CDBN？ target =“ _ blank”> IDF目标是也门罢工中的Houthi参谋长，军方确认'post'＆nbsp; nbsp; 耶路撒冷邮政href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipgfbvv95cuxpndfjrkdksmlfn1bttttt0llutduttthttzjjjjjjjjjjnttzjjjnttzjjngng4ngf4ngff4gfffbfbbnne1wdgbnne1wtvvvy ddppkpkaw4qpkaw91qugtpkawn41qugt zrtnoztfnemfhlxpqzml2xzfmmnuxu2ljvzf3tzq2tm5fy1fvb1hrrzriowl2dwdrnfyt NKXOUKPMA0EWMLVXT0J4VEM0U2FRDZDNJJHTUTJSETKWW52BU55CLFVN1VSYUPB？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> houthis在以色列暗杀罢工报告中的商店中说'1000名领导人'
